title: Correlation
text: attempt link similar features basis correlation. TangledFeatures automatically detects type correlation needed two features. currently generate correlations numeric, factor(categorical) ordered factor types. can set correlation type based upon data set within package. can also generate correlation heat map entire data set well interconnected network graph

title: Correlation
text: Numeric - Numeric Correlation: Set cor1 metric. Currently defaults Pearson correlation Numeric - Factor(Unordered): Set cor2 metric. Currently defaults Pearson correlation Numeric - Factor(Ordered): Set cor3 metric. Currently defaults Pearson correlation Factor(Unordered) - Factor(Ordered) Set cor3 metric. Currently defaults Pearson correlation Factor(Unordered) - Factor(Unordered) Set cor3 metric. Currently defaults Pearson correlation Factor(Ordered) - Factor(Ordered) Set cor3 metric. Currently defaults Pearson correlation

title: Correlation
text: Set plot = TRUE inital function can generate heat map final TangledFeatures object can generate interconnected graph well
code: plot_obj <- TangledFeatures(Data)$Correlation_heatmap plot(plot_obj) plot_obj <- TangledFeatures(Data)$Graph_plot plot(plot_obj)

title: The main TangledFeatures function — TangledFeatures
text: main TangledFeatures function

title: The main TangledFeatures function — TangledFeatures
code: TangledFeatures(   Data,   Y_var,   Focus_variables = list(),   corr_cutoff = 0.7,   RF_coverage = 0.95,   num_features = 5,   plot = FALSE,   fast_calculation = FALSE,   cor1 = "pearson",   cor2 = "PointBiserial",   cor3 = "cramersV" )

title: The main TangledFeatures function — TangledFeatures
text: Data imported Data Frame Y_var dependent variable Focus_variables list variables wish give certain bias correlation matrix corr_cutoff correlation cutoff variable. Defaults 0.8 RF_coverage Random Forest coverage explainable. Defaults 95 percent num_features number features returned within random forest plot Return plotting done. Binary True False fast_calculation Returns variable list without many Random Forest iterations simply picking variable correlated group cor1 correlation metric two continuous features. Defaults pearson correlation cor2 correlation metric one categorical feature one continuous feature. Defaults bi serial correlation correlation cor3 correlation metric two categorical features. Defaults CramersV correlation

title: The main TangledFeatures function — TangledFeatures
text: Returns list variables ready future modelling
